title: Nocturne
body:
As a Nocturne main since Level 16 it's sad that I rarely get to play him cause he is so weak in the jungle, I have some ideas to help him out though

Make the range on his ultimate bigger, OR the cool down lower NOT both otherwise he will probably start getting picked a lot and called "OP"
His passive I also think should be buffed a little, more healing OR lower cool down, maybe 8 seconds, I haven't thought about it exactly to get the 'perfect numbers' but if Riot looks at this and consider it I'm sure they can figure out a good middle ground....Hopefully

He can be strong when going against certain Team Comps, but he is really easy to shut down and it's hard for him to catch back up, he is a okay pick but I think with those slight buffs mentioned above, he could go from a okay pick to a good pick, just please don't make him OP, I would prefer to play him over him being banned or picked all the time

replies.body: Nocturne and weak do not belong in the same sentence.
Hypocrite! Why would you put Nocturne and weak in the same sentence?
No offense OP but Nocturne is in a very good place right now. He is most definitely not weak either. Once his done his first clear jg is a breeze and soloing dragon is aswell with his spell shield
The only change I could think of to help him without making him OP is lowering it's cooldown if you dont use the dash, and maybe increase the duration a bit too.
I think it's just the clear speed that everyone is annoyed about. Give him a bit more health and maybe he'll do better.
